title: The One-Person Agency Machine
description: A wireframe for leverage: capture intent → qualify automatically → deliver an irresistible artifact → route humans only at the money step. The goal is not more work. The goal is more closing power with less surface area.

title: Content-to-Cash Conveyor
description: Abstract flow: publish signal → harvest attention → route into a simple offer → auto-follow-up until they buy or die. Everything is modular. Nothing is sacred. Kill friction everywhere.

title: Affiliate War Room
description: A simple mental model: pick one audience + one pain + one outcome. Build a single page that sells the transformation, not the product. Then deploy variations like probes until one bites hard.
